Name: Last Girl in Futa Sexpocalypse
About the game: Evil forces invaded the world and converted everyone to futanari, greatly increasing their sexual lust. The civilization collapsed immediately as almost everyone fell under the influence of the invaders, seeking only pleasure. Those under their control became feral, lusting for constant sexual intercourse, and becoming increasingly angry and destructive when they don't get satisfied. The invaders feed off the emotions of sexual frustration, greatly increasing their power. You're the only person who is immune to the conversion, and you are trying to find a cure and restore humanity. You managed to develop a serum which can quickly restore free will in those who became feral, but you have to be careful, as every one of the enemies can sense you and will immediately become lusting for you from a great distance. Features: - Unique combination of match 3 puzzle gameplay and erotic visual novel scenes. - Incredibly sexy female protagonist - Luscious pixel artwork throughout. - Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of futanari girls. - Can be played with one hand. Gameplay: Match tokens to control the actions of your character as she progresses through the levels, fighting various enemies. You have to match the right tokens to perform the specific actions, like healing yourself or damaging the enemy. The story is a linear progression through levels combined with visual novel elements narrating what's happening and telling the story of the game. As you progress you'll uncover the main storyline and you'll play a series of match 3 puzzle games against different opponents.
